Why is Bluestone Jewel falling/rising?

As of 05-Dec, Bluestone Jewellery & Lifestyle Ltd’s stock price has fallen sharply, reflecting a combination of weak financial performance, deteriorating fundamentals, and increased selling pressure from promoters, all contributing to the sustained downward trend in the share price.
